00009 #if !defined(Apoxi_MessageMap_hpp)
00010 #define Apoxi_MessageMap_hpp
00013 
00014 #include <Kernel/System.hpp>
00015 #include <Kernel/MsgTypes.hpp>
00016 #include <Kernel/Application.hpp>
00017 
00019 template<class T> struct MessageMap {
00020     MsgId msg_id;
00021     BOOLEAN (T::*func)(const Message &msg);
00022 };
00023 
00025 class AbstractMessageMapContainer {
00026     public:
00027         virtual void Register() const = 0;
00028         virtual void Unregister() const = 0;
00029         virtual BOOLEAN Execute(const Message &msg) const = 0;
00030 };
00031 
00033 template<class T> class MessageMapContainer : public AbstractMessageMapContainer {
00034     public:
00035         MessageMapContainer(T *dispatcher = 0, const MessageMap<T> *msg_map = 0) :
00036             m_dispatcher(dispatcher), m_msg_map(msg_map) { }
00037 
00038         virtual void Init(T *dispatcher, const MessageMap<T> *msg_map) {
00039             m_dispatcher = dispatcher;
00040             m_msg_map = msg_map;
00041         }
00042         
00043         virtual void Register() const
00044         {
00045             ASSERT_ALWAYS(m_dispatcher != 0 && m_msg_map != 0);
00046 
00047             INT i = 0;
00048             Application* app = System::GetActiveApplication();
00049 
00050             while (m_msg_map[i].msg_id != NoMessage::ID) {
00051                 ASSERT_DEBUG(m_msg_map[i].func != 0);
00052                 app->RegisterMessage(m_msg_map[i].msg_id);
00053                 i++;
00054             }
00055         }
00056 
00057         virtual void Unregister() const
00058         {
00059             ASSERT_ALWAYS(m_dispatcher != 0 && m_msg_map != 0);
00060 
00061             INT i = 0;
00062             Application* app = System::GetActiveApplication();
00063 
00064             while (m_msg_map[i].msg_id != NoMessage::ID) {
00065                 ASSERT_DEBUG(m_msg_map[i].func != 0);
00066                 app->UnregisterMessage(m_msg_map[i].msg_id);
00067                 i++;
00068             }
00069         }
00070     
00071         virtual BOOLEAN Execute(const Message& msg) const
00072         {
00073             ASSERT_ALWAYS(m_dispatcher != 0 && m_msg_map != 0);
00074 
00075             INT i = 0;
00076             while (m_msg_map[i].msg_id != NoMessage::ID) {
00077                 ASSERT_DEBUG(m_msg_map[i].func != 0);
00078                 if (m_msg_map[i].msg_id == msg.Id())
00079                     return (m_dispatcher->*(m_msg_map[i].func))(msg);
00080                 i++;
00081             }
00082 
00083             return FALSE;
00084         }
00085 
00086     private:
00087         T *m_dispatcher;
00088         const MessageMap<T>* m_msg_map;
00089 };
00090 
00092 #endif  // Apoxi_MessageMap_hpp
